Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 41-44 However , simple incorporation of the thieno- [3,4-b]thiophene units might increase the highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) level of polymers , which causes a significant loss of open - circuit voltages in PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| thieno-[3,4-b]thiophene units |
| polymers |
| highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) levels |
| PSCs (Perovskite Solar Cells) |
